thread.title: GM says South Korean arm could file for bankruptcy

title: GM says South Korean arm could file for bankruptcy
text:
GM says South Korean arm could file for bankruptcy 12:09pm BST - 01:07 
GM's South Korean arm may file for bankruptcy if the union representing local workers doesn't agree to cutting labor costs by April 20. The statement puts pressure on both striking workers and the South Korean government to agree to a proposed company restructure.   
GM's South Korean arm may file for bankruptcy if the union representing local workers doesn't agree to cutting labor costs by April 20. The statement puts pressure on both striking workers and the South Korean government to agree to a proposed company restructure.  //reut.rs/2pJnkot
